# LucasFlix - Netflix-inspired Movie Tracking App

This is a React + TypeScript project using Vite for tracking movie watching sessions with friends.

## Project Structure
- Uses React Router for navigation
- LocalStorage for data persistence (prepared for Firebase migration)
- Netflix-like dark theme UI
- Recharts for statistics visualization

## Key Features
- Session tracking with sleep times and "Momento PÃ©s" mini-game
- Shame Wall for tracking who fell asleep
- Rankings (Most Awake, King of Feet)
- Daily Movies with star voting
- Statistics with charts
- Backup/restore via clipboard
